DOC.brief_summary: Compare the renal complication of endovascular and open repair of acute aortic dissection by including patient treated at NTUH in 2010~2013.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of the Effects of Open and Endovascular Aortic Aneurysm Repair on Long-term Renal Function
DOC.criteria: Patient underwent endovascular and open repair of aortic aneurysm at NTUH in 2010~2013 Age > 20 years old
